LanguageData.BR_Flag_Hediff.label: Imperial Guard Flag
LanguageData.BR_Flag_Hediff.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is in the vicinity of the Imperial Guard Flag. [PAWN_pronoun] has increased movement speed.
LanguageData.BR_grave_Hediff.label: Tomb of the Unknown Guardsman
LanguageData.BR_grave_Hediff.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is in the vicinity of the Tomb of the Unknown Guardsman. [PAWN_pronoun] has increased working speed.
LanguageData.BR_Tower_Hediff.label: Magnificent Memorial
LanguageData.BR_Tower_Hediff.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is in the vicinity of the Magnificent Memorial. [PAWN_pronoun] has increased pain tolerance and decreased mental breakdown threshold.
